Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Filmore
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie/California buses are temp. rerouted via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt and Kedzie: due to, fire department activity near Kedzie/Filmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt, Kedzie and over regular route, due to fire department activity near Kedzie/Filmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay at Polk. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay at Polk.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
